title: NIT Silchar Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Project Associate Posts
description: National Institute of Technology Silchar (NIT Silchar) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Silchar Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply on...
